definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ec 1:13 occupation, task, only Ec (Aram. loan-word Lag:BN 205; common in NH);—´[[ע]] abs. Ec 2:26, Ec 3:10, Ec 5:2, Ec 8:16; sf. [[כַּעַס עִנְיׇנוֹ]] Ec 2:23 his task is (sheer) vextion; [[עִנְיׇן רָע]] Ec 1:13 an evil (worthless) task, so Ec 4:8 (Mass. [[עִנְיַן]] as if cstr., v. Baer:1; Baer:13; but Kö:ii, 1, 99), and, in weakened sense, Ec 5:12 a bad business, bad affair.
